title: Star Jones Hurls a Vile, Racist Slur at Ben Carson
text:
ISIS Now Uses Chemical Weapons Against Children 
Twitchy reported on several of the social media posts aimed at Carson, many of which were explicit and racist in nature, not to mention simply mean-spirited and in no way indicative of a desire for constructive debate or “tolerance” for differing viewpoints. One example was the following from actor Samuel L. Jackson. Warning: Explicit and racist language. OK!! Ben Carson….I can't! Immigrants ? In the bottom of SLAVE SHIPS??!! MUTHAFUKKA PLEASE!!! #dickheadedtom 
— Samuel L. Jackson (@SamuelLJackson) March 6, 2017 
In response to Jackson’s tweet, attorney, author and TV talking head Star Jones issued a vile racial slur of her own toward Carson. It’s one that would have resulted in at least a temporary ban from the social media network and widespread condemnation if it had been launched by a white person against a black liberal, but which is apparently perfectly OK when directed at a black conservative by a black liberal.   
Jones wrote, “Did Carson start out as a self-hating coon, or did he develop his ‘coonery’ over time? # QuestionsThatKeepMeAwake” Did Carson start out as a self-hating coon, or did he develop his "coonery" over time? #QuestionsThatKeepMeAwake # https://t.co/N1Tgys6i25 https://t.co/rOqWTb4Q0R 
— Star Jones (@StarJonesEsq) March 6, 2017
